## StatPREP Summer Workshop 2018: Minneapolis/St. Paul

The workshop will be held at
St. Catherine University, Saint Paul, MN

- Friday June 8, 4pm - 8pm, dinner provided
- Saturday June 9, 9am - 5pm, lunch provided

## Hub leader

* Joe Roith, St. Kates, `jmroith@stkate.edu`

## Application to participate

As of late April, there are a few open spots for the workshop. Contact hub leader Joe Roith for more information.
